ttp_template:
<group name="connection_status_domain_id_local_int_local_int_status">
Domain-id  : {{DOMAIN_ID | ORPHRASE}}
Local-interface  : {{LOCAL_INT | ORPHRASE}}
Peer-address  : {{PEER_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
Peer-link  : {{PEER_LINK | ORPHRASE}}
Peer-link status  : {{PEER_LINK_STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
Role  : {{ROLE | ORPHRASE}}
State  : {{STATE | ORPHRASE}}
System-id  : {{SYSTEM_ID | ORPHRASE}}
Connection status  : {{CONNECTION_STATUS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
MLAG Status
===========
Domain-id              : 1
Local-interface        : Port-Channel10
Peer-address           : 10.1.1.2
Peer-link              : Ethernet1/1
Peer-link status       : up
Local-Int status       : up
Peer-link status       : up
Role                   : primary
State                  : active
System-id              : 00:1c:73:00:00:01
Connection status      : connected

==========
Port           Local-int      Peer-int            Status
